name: suicidal
content:
suicidal adjective
(DEATH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
People who are suicidal want to kill themselves or are in a mental state in which it is likely that they will try to do so: Pete was so depressed after his girlfriend left him that I actually thought he was suicidal.
Suicidal behaviour is likely to result in death: He took some suicidal risks.
